item.title: Ambassador API GW and Keycloak integration
item.description: Ambassador API GW is an Open Source Kubernetes-Native API Gateway built on the Envoy Proxy. It supports plugin mechanism to bring your own authentication. An AuthService manifest configures Ambassador to use an external service to check authentication and authorization for incoming requests. Each incoming request is authenticated before routing to its destination. This way we can use existing authentication backends like Keycloak. Keycloak is an open source identity and access management solution.
